verbs.description: The absolute hate and bitterness [V: has] reached new highs in the effort to bring down the Trump presidency .
[ARG0: The absolute hate and bitterness] has [V: reached] [ARG1: new highs] [ARGM-LOC: in the effort to bring down the Trump presidency] .
